TopicTitle: Need help for a PIP for camera mod

Articles.Content:
Hi,

I've been wanting to contribute to the ksp modding community for a while now, and used to love the Lazor Docking Cam. I want to develop something along those lines as Lazor doesn't work anymore. Fortunately I do have experience in Blender. However, I do not have much with Unity, or C# (Java I'm fine with).

It would be great if there was someone out there that would join me in this venture.

I have put together a 5min model of the concept of the first camera: http://i.imgur.com/fmrE7Pp.png

Please let us know if you're interested

Regards

Icarus
